title: Caterpillar Inc.
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (often shortened to CAT) is an American Fortune 100 corporation that designs, develops, engineers, manufactures, markets, and sells machinery, engines, financial products, and insurance to customers via a worldwide dealer network. It is the world's largest construction-equipment manufacturer.[3][4][7] In 2018, Caterpillar was ranked number 65 on the Fortune 500 list[8] and number 238 on the Global Fortune 500 list.[9] Caterpillar stock is a component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average.[10]
